extendedInfo.description: When it comes to managing field workers and mobile employees, this task can be daunting at times. Numerous job locations, seasonal employees, documenting billable hours, recording breaks are all responsibilities of the employer. How is a company to manage their workforce efficiently and productively without slowing down progress of the workers and/or the project at hand? Timecard GPS is a mobile time and attendance and GPS Tracking application that works on Standard Cell Phones, Smart Phones and Tablets. Field Workers are able to log the following data from a mobile device: â¢	Time â¢	Attendance â¢	Jobs â¢	Tasks â¢	Sub-tasks â¢	Cost codes â¢	Breaks â¢	Lunch period â¢	Custom fields (weather conditions, anyone hurt on job?, etc.) â¢	Supervisor â Team Clock in/out Management is able to view the location of employees on Google maps from Econz web-based software and real-time job information such as: â¢	GPS tracking information â¢	Bread crumb trails â¢	Speed triggers â¢	Mileage â¢	Idle time â¢	GPS smart fence technology â¢	Over 20 reports â¢	Time and attendance â¢	Job progress â¢	Hours worked Companies that use Econz Timecard benefit in the following ways: â¢	Increased worker productivity â¢	Decrease in time-theft by company employees â¢	Manage their workforce more efficiently â¢	Increase profits â¢	Savings on everyday costs such as fuel, overtime  and administration â¢	Helps document Federal and State wage-hour laws â¢	Streamline time and attendance Timecard GPS offers more than 20 custom reports and Econz stores all data for a 6 month period, including GPS tracking information. Supervisors can log in/out multiple workers on one device at no additional cost. Econz Wireless offers a web-user log in capability for internal workers, giving Econz Wireless customers a complete time and attendance system. Econz Wireless products also integrate into over 100 accounting and payroll packages such as:â¢	ADP Payroll â¢	Kronos â¢	Paychex â¢	Sage MasterBuilderâ¢	Sage Timberlineâ¢	Foundationâ¢	Viewpointâ¢	QuickBooks â¢	Over 100 more packagesâ¦ Econz Wireless can also do custom builds specific to your Company needs. Please contact our offices to discuss further. If you would like to view our Public SOAP API's please click the link. Econz Timecard is ideal for small organizations of 5 employees or enterprise groups of thousands of workers .With a 30 day money back guarantee, get started with Econz Timecard and streamline your company's time and attendance needs!*Note: To enable Timecard to work with your device, your company must have a Timecard organization configured and setup prior to downloading the application. Please contact Econz Wireless at sales@econz.com.Econz Wireless( est. 1971) - is a Leader in Mobile Data Collection, providing employer solutions for Time & Attendance, Employee Tracking and Wage-Hour Compliance Laws.

reviews.title: Used for eight years
reviews.comment: I have used timecard for eight years. It allows me to track my time and bill my customers.  I go online to pull many different types of reports or pull down data in csv format. It makes all the difference to my consultancy business.
reviews.author: Cynthia Koan

reviews.title: Won\'t work
reviews.comment: Must be made for tablets. The ok button would not work. Stuck on setup
reviews.author: paul bass

reviews.title: Very Worth it!
reviews.comment: Great product! The app does everything it says it would. Staff is very helpful knowledgeable addressed situations that I was trying to address. Make sure to call customer support to setup your account. Everything from there is logical and simple to use. My employees whereabouts are now known and the jobs are being accomplished more efficiently and my business is being more successful because of it. Thank you Econz!
reviews.author: Colin Moss

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I found this app to be great for my business. I am able to get info from my workers and know their location. App does not drain battery like others i have tested ad last a full work day. No sure of the below reviews about setup, I contacted company support as described in app details and they quickly got me setup with a account and using the system. Great job guys!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung s3 device
reviews.comment: Great application. I knowv where my employees are at ALL the times throughout the day and my wife no longer has to enter in our guys time sheets.  Henry
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: No instructions on how to use this app...had to just try and figure it out.  Once I completed the set up, tried to start the time clock...but I could never get it to work.  I tried it both inside and outside...but to no avail.  I tried to \"connect\" manually, but kept getting a message that my request was put in que...something that should be automatic and instantanious when I opened the app.  This would have been a perfect app for my company...if only it worked. At least I didn\'t pay for it.  Would have been helpful to have a list of supported devices right on download page.  Had to go to register page to find that my device was not supported.  The current list is as follows:    A phone with TimeCard downloaded. The following phone models are supported:    -  Audiovox CDM-8940    -  LGE VX4500    -  LGE VX4650    -  LGE VX4700    -  LGE VX5200    -  LGE VX6100    -  LGE VX7000    -  LGE VX8000    -  LGE VX8100    -  Motorola E815    -  Motorola V260    -  Motorola V265    -  Motorola V276    -  Motorola V325    -  Motorola V710    -  Samsung SCH-A890    -  Samsung SCH-A950    -  Samsung SCH-A970    -  Samsung SCH-N330
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Econz time card
reviews.comment: 30 minutes trying to get through setup... still not ready to go... must be something more intuitive than this!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Emme
reviews.comment: v1.25 is great. very useful and gps capabilities are awesome and very accurate. no issues (Samsung Galaxy S2)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update is fantastic
reviews.comment: Loving v1.25.  The new background service that auto-starts with the phone makes it a must-have update. Easy to use, all around great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This application is great for tracking my employees time and mileage.  The interface is simple and to the point. Mainly used on HTC Evo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Empoyee Time Recorder
reviews.comment: I have been working with the company for 5 or 6 years. This was a app on Verizon Phones that was state of the art. Thanks Harry and Jay your great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes other apps on phone
reviews.comment: Most of the employees complain about this app either not working at all, or crashing or interfering with other apps on the phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: This app sucks, don\'t waist one more second even thinking about downloading.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Precise geofencing!
reviews.comment: Love the geofencing feature! Super accurate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No action on galaxy
reviews.comment: App does not work on samsung galaxy
reviews.author: A Google User
